text: "Rock You Like a Hurricane" is a 1984 song by German hard rock band Scorpions. It is the leading single from their ninth studio album Love at First Sting and went to number 25 in the United States, number 78 in the United Kingdom, number 47 in the Netherlands, number 37 in Canada and number 17 in France. ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Scorpions (band) songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Rock You Like a Hurricane
